name: p5-typescript-starter
description: Project to quickly get something working in [p5.js](https://p5js.org/) and [typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)

scripts.postbuild: cp index.html build/index.html && mkdir build/assets && cp style.css build/style.css && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-sounds
scripts.copy-images: cp assets/favicon.ico build/assets/favicon.ico && cp assets/icon.png build/assets/icon.png && cp assets/thumbnail.jpg build/assets/thumbnail.jpg
